name: Friends In The Dark (BigBite)
description:
Magician with his shadow friends are running away from dangerous creatures. He stops to fight back, but something goes wrong and he found himself in some kind of dark abandoned dungeon. Also his friends disappeared somewhere too! Now he must find them and his way out from the "not so abandoned" place.

Install instructions:

  1. Download zip file
  2. Open
  3. Move files on desktop
  4. Open "Game Files"
  5. Click "Friends in the Dark.exe"
  6. Enjoy :)

Controls:

  • L/X - hide
  • ;/C - attack
  • A/Left arrow - left
  • D/Right arrow - right
  • Space - jump
  • Space in the air - double jump
  • ESC - pause game

Game was made for Brackeys GameJam 2022
